University of Virginia Library’s use policy.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Papers of Stephen Philip Holt, Accession #7687-d, Special Collections, University of Virginia Library, Charlottesville, Va.

acqinfo.head: Acquisition Information
acqinfo.p: This addition to the Papers of Stephen Philip Holt was originally deposited 8 March 1965by Mr. Holt and was withdrawn by Mr. Holt's executor on 2 August 1974. it was re-deposited by Mr. David J. Wood, et al., in October 1974

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content Information
scopecontent.p: This addition to the Papers of Stephen Philip Holt consists of six drawings which probably belonged to Joseph Miller of London and includes the following: a plan of part of the Isle of Dogs, River Thames; a plan for the hold of a ship; two plans for a crane to lift thirty tons in Dundee Harbor; and two unidentified buildings.

arrangement.head: Organization
arrangement.p: The first plan is in a folder following #7687-c and the last five are placed with the oversize folder #7687-c
